website_summaries.verdict: Most runners were happy with the performance of the Asics Gel Flux 5. Some of them welcomed the supportive upper and midsole, while others fawned about its eye-catching design. Moreover, this neutral road shoe was deemed lightweight. On the other hand, there were complaints about a need for a break-in period, as well as problems on durability.
pros: The cushioning systems that are present in the Asics Gel Flux 5 were appreciated by those who have tested it
Most consumers considered this running shoe to be right to size
The color schemes were lauded because it made the façade more eye-catching
The weight of this product was considered to be suitably light
Most purchasers noted that the upper and the sole unit were able to support the shape and motion of the foot
cons: Some testers claimed that the Gel Flux 5 required an initial break-in period of a few uses before becoming comfortable
The durability of the shoe has been disappointing to some, especially when compared to the previous version of the Gel Flux

customer_reviews.title: Narrower toe box than all prior models, seems more cheaply made than prior models
customer_reviews.text: Toe box is narrower than all four prior Gel-flux models. Front of my foot felt squeezed, both sides and the top of my foot. Probably the result of eliminating the band around the toe box which enabled them to provide more space inside for a slightly wider foot. This narrower fit in the toe box eliminates the reason I've bought Gel-Flux for years. Also the materials used seem cheaper with this model compared to all prior models. Time to look at other brands. Hopefully they'll fix their mistakes with #6 and get back on track..
customer_reviews.author: DanO

customer_reviews.title: Good for supination
customer_reviews.text: Actually, these are not women's. This is like my 5th pair of the gel flux. I have had versions 2-5. I hope they don't stop making because they fit good. The secret is the independent plastic truss between toe and heel sole sections. This minimizes twisting and allows the heel to anchor the shoe and minimizes supination (rolling to outside). This results in more even wear and less stress on both the shoe upper and sole. This means they last much longer. My other secret is shoe trees. These cedar forms are placed inside the shoes immediately after wearing drying them and retarding bacteria which would otherwise weaken the uppers.
customer_reviews.author: Rick roth

customer_reviews.title: Wet comfortable/Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! Great comfort and value. I’ve run thousands of miles in ASICS shoes getting a new pair/style every 300-500 miles but this is one of the most comfortable pairs yet. I ordered another pair after my first run. No breaking in needed, they are great right out of the box. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than previous versions of this shoe
customer_reviews.text: The gel flux 5 toe box is considerably narrower than previous versions of this shoe. I returned them and bought a half size larger. The toe box width of the larger shoe is about right, but I haven’t worn them enough yet to see if the length will be a problem. Also the material of the gel flux 5 doesn’t seem to be as sturdy as the previous version of this shoe. I am accustomed to getting about 900 miles on a pair of these. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: RW-56

customer_reviews.title: ASICS Mens Gel-Flux 5 Running Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of Asics. I purchased two of the same model, and two other models. I buy the same size and width each time, and they fit me just right. My podiatrist told my wife and I that Asics are the only shoes he wants us to wear for walking. I walk about 3.5 miles, Monday - Friday. The Asics usually last about 18 months. They are comfortable and I will continue to purchase Asics when I need new shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J., Orlando

customer_reviews.title: These Asics shoes are comfortable for running
customer_reviews.text: These Asics shoes are comfortable for running, walking and standing all day. The cushioning in the heel counter is excellent for a heavy heel striker like myself. I would definitely recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Reginald

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes looking for a replacement for my Gel Fortitude shoes(which I love!)that have been discontinued. They were recommended as a good substitute but they fell far short. They were too tight and don't cushion as well. I've never had to break in a running shoe but I need to wear these a little at a time and they slowly seem to become more bearable to wear. Buy something different next time.
customer_reviews.author: Just my opinion

customer_reviews.title: an okay shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dissapointed, since I had a pair of Flux 2 from about 3 years ago that were instantly comfortable and still are great. However these Flux 5 were okay, definitely not as comfortable as the Flux 2. I've been wearing for several weeks of workouts, and they do the job. maybe after another couple of months they'll be more comfortable. Oh, my original Flux 2 are 10 1/2, I ordered 11 because of other comments to order 1/2 size bigger than normal. I had to return the 11s and got the 11 1/2. Needless to say, for my next pair of shoes I'll definitely be shopping around.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley S Zygmunt

customer_reviews.title: Mesh breaks after only 1.5 months
customer_reviews.text: I don't have abnormally large feet, although wide sneakers generally fit better. That being said, I've worn D fit shoes before and these run much smaller than expected. That's fine and sometimes even helpful when running; the snugness and the shock absorbers create a bounce that feels okay. However, I'm appalled to see the mesh breaking after around only runs between 3-9 miles each in this shoe. I heard good things about ASICS, but it seems like the quality of this product does not match the expectation! Try something else!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great for running. They have great support and have not heard any tears after many miles of use. The tod box is nice and wide so I don’t get any irritation to the toes. I also picked these up here for 50 percent cheaper than the local store. Great buy. Always check amazon before you buy in store.
customer_reviews.author: SteveS

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I had the previous generation of this shoe and wore them out. The toe box seems a little narrower in this gen. Still a good shoe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Wore out fast
customer_reviews.text: I buy ASICS all the time, I had holes in both toes by two months. These did not hold up well at all.
customer_reviews.author: L. Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable sneaker i've purchased
customer_reviews.text: By far the most comfortable sneaker i've ever purchased. There could be a tad more arch support but for my purposes (ie. not running, hiking etc.) it does an excellent job. Great padding all around and easy to clean. Great shoe all around.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Black

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for flat feet -- outdoor running
customer_reviews.text: I am flat footed and unlike indoor treadmill running, I needed a more stable shoe for long outdoor runs. I am able to go 10 miles in these shoes with no discomfort. Us flat footed runners cannot mess around when it comes to shoes. This Asics product does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: AnnArborDad

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but too small for size
customer_reviews.text: Great priced shoe but my 8.5 foot was to big for this 8.5M shoe. To tight in the toes. I donated these to charity after running in them a few times and bought size 9M...which were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Havocman

customer_reviews.title: I love the "squish" in Asics Gel shoes
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older/different model of Asics shoe. It fit a little tight across the ball of my right foot - but I broke it in by wearing them at night in the house & fits okay now. I don't run (2 replaced knees), but Asics Gel shoes are fine for walking.
customer_reviews.author: Kansas Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size is small
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe but fit is way to tight in the tow. I wear a 15 and could only wear these for about 10 minutes before taking them off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good consistent shoe for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a replacement for my husband's ~5yr old original Gel-Flux athletic shoes that have finally worn out. While nothing special to look at, he says the fit remains consistent after 5 generations (this is Gel-Flux 5) and perfect for the gym or travelling. Good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Second Pair - but because I wanted a new clean pair to wear!
customer_reviews.text: Wear these regularly. Have one pair to workout in and walk the dogs. The other pair is to wear out of the house and still look clean. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great gym shoes !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great running shoes at a real reasonable price. Had planters fasciitis and these shoes helped me get over it. Best shoes out there for me. My podiatrist recommended this brand to me. Great deal for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They don't even come close to the pair of GEL Contend 3 I have !
customer_reviews.text: They don't even come close to the pair of GEL Contend 3 I have ! The day I got my Contend 3 I went on a 4 mile walk. NO problems fit great ! These were super tight, didn't have the GEL sole , I could go across the room without pain! Sent them back !
customer_reviews.author: SubeeTed

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The first time I laced up the shoes their extremely comfortable like your walking on air. I had to exchange a 12 for an 11 1/2. The heel is different snug but not to where it hurts. The look of the shoes is top notch pretty fancy. I feel that these shoes can be used for work. Or if you need to flat out run you’re good hands. For the price you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna E

customer_reviews.title: Running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Really good sneaker - box arrived with no damages, shoes were in mint condition, as sometimes new shoes arrive in opened box. Great shoe for running
customer_reviews.author: Frankito

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but it barely stands up to Asics standards, this is the low end shoe.
customer_reviews.author: George Willings

customer_reviews.title: Asics are the best
customer_reviews.text: You have to look for the perfect shoes for you. Asics work fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge L Rivera Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Asics running sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I always buy these sneakers they are not expensive but are still recomended by podiatrists .
customer_reviews.author: Jack J. Kempf

customer_reviews.title: Shoe is narrow, but is not labelled as such
customer_reviews.text: Given the mis-labelling, I shouldn't have had to pay return shipping charge.
customer_reviews.author: W. Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the overall appearance of this shoe. Comfortable for most part. Toebox a bit tight but should give as it is worn.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. They fit perfect and have really improved my running. They are true to fit and extremely comfortable. I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for the long run
customer_reviews.text: Exactly the same exceptional quality that I have come to expect from Ascis. They are very firm but have the right amount of give for a long pounding to ease the impact on your back and knees.
customer_reviews.author: Al Q

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable shoe. Used to be dedicated Nike wearer, but Asics comfort can't be matched. Especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Johnson

customer_reviews.title: He likes these!
customer_reviews.text: They wear and wash very well. He said they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are comfortable the minute I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Canright

customer_reviews.title: Not the most comfortable ASICS I've worn
customer_reviews.text: The insole on the right shoe doesn't fit comfortable. I would recommend buying 1 whole size bigger than you usually wear. I'll never go for the cheaper ASICS shoes again.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Too tight around the toes
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and too tight around the toes. Bought it for my dad for daily walks and gave him blisters the 2nd day of wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: sonika

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe great price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable show for running and working out. I have plantar fasciitis and fallen arches so running is always a trick. These shoes feel great on my feet. I bought a 2nd pair just for every day wear :)
customer_reviews.author: Tony Bradds

customer_reviews.title: This is the 3rd pair of Asics that I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Asics that I have purchased. I use the shoes for running and for workout classes at the gym. I've had trouble with knee pain when running in other shoes, but the Asics have been great for running..
customer_reviews.author: Greg T

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes (9.5 D). Even though I read several negative reviews, with the price under $40 I took a chance and am pleased. Of course the shoes are only a couple of days old so I cannot comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: J. Largay

customer_reviews.title: Assics typical shoe, buying for 30 years now..
customer_reviews.text: I have not disliked anything, fit, comfort, stability, are all real good, very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed but a little rigid at first. once broken in a little comfortable all day.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin M. Montagna

customer_reviews.title: Yes buy these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again for sure from this seller. Excellent shoes
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and better than my Nike air max I paid twice as much for
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Asics for me fit very well. I have a narrow foot so most shoes are too wide. They are my new fav's
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Good Deal for the price. Asics, make difference than any brands.
customer_reviews.author: Avinash

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are okay. Not much to boast about and ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are okay. Not much to boast about and no real complaints.
customer_reviews.author: donvarg

customer_reviews.title: Total comfort
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a great sneaker. Lots of stability in the rearfoot. Very nice shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Art Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes without Breaking Bank
customer_reviews.text: Love the new shoes. I put 3 miles the first day I got them. Solid running shoes at an AMAZING PRICE!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I’ve put about 200+ miles on these shoes and they are still kicking.
customer_reviews.author: Christina B

customer_reviews.title: Not an upgrade from previous styles
customer_reviews.text: Even the most loyal Asics fans will be disappointed with this style. At least I am. It has given me horrible knee and foot pain.
customer_reviews.author: Unhappy customer

customer_reviews.title: Lack support
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit fine but don’t have quite as much support as ASICS i have had in the past. I
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Tough shoes
customer_reviews.text: Takes a couple runs for your feet to break them in
customer_reviews.author: Lizbeth

customer_reviews.title: Won’t disappoint!!
customer_reviews.text: I like ASICS. I had bought this pair at the local shoe store for $70. I really liked them and decided to order another pair here. Great price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great budget shoe! Holds up well under about 35 miles/week of running!
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Good Treadmill running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these running shoes and they are as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hoherd

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you order the right size
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes I wear them at work great if you do a lot of walking like I do
customer_reviews.author: Alphonse

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my work out / running shoes I really like how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.author: Jhonathan L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Good service.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, very comfortable, unlike most ASICS the colors are low key. I buy a new pair every year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased a middle schooler.
customer_reviews.text: No complaints from my middle school son. He liked the color and the comfort of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: SissyB

customer_reviews.title: Good light shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fits as expected and is light. This is my 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small in the toe area.
customer_reviews.text: I normally where a size 9 but these shoes are too small. I wore them one time and put them back in the box. Goodwill here I come!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: For the price they are the best shoes I've owned. I could stand around all day in them.
customer_reviews.author: Josiah Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable practicality
customer_reviews.text: Good-looking, lightweight , and comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bences

customer_reviews.title: Asics, great fit looks good
customer_reviews.text: Great fit arrived on time was 10.00 less expensive then foot locker
customer_reviews.author: Stuart L.

customer_reviews.title: tighter than expected
customer_reviews.text: good shoes. Look strong. hope once with use, they will be less tighter
customer_reviews.author: Alecusu

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for good price - high VFM.
customer_reviews.text: Good price for quality running shoes. It takes 5-6 times to get use and feel comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Client d'Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the price
customer_reviews.text: As other reviews state, they do run about a half size small so order accordingly. They fight nicely and are comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

product_meta.title: Asics - Mens Gel-Flux 5 Shoes, 11 UK, Carbon/Black/Cherry Tomato
product_meta.description: International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
feature_bullets: The ASICS® GEL-Flux 5 running shoe will have you ready to run with its energized cushioning and structural support.
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
